item.title: Bank of England holds rates steady in narrow vote ahead of Autumn Budget
item.description: While the central bank was seen as more likely to hold rates than not, it's not a given, according to economists.

item.title: Op-ed: The fuel for the AI boom driving the markets is advertising. It is also an existential risk.
item.description: Joe Marchese, Executive Chairman at Human Ventures, describes a key conundrum facing OpenAI and other AI start-ups as they disrupt the ad tech industr...

item.title: Private payrolls rose 42,000 in October, more than expected and countering labor market fears, ADP says
item.description: Companies added 42,000 jobs for the month, following a decline of 29,000 and topping the estimate for a gain of 22,000.

item.title: Job openings in October slumped to the lowest level since February 2021, Indeed measure shows
item.description: Under normal conditions, the BLS on Tuesday would have reported its monthly Job Openings and Labor Turnover Survey.

item.title: Bessent says U.S. has 'lots' of options to use on tariffs if it loses Supreme Court case
item.description: The high court it set Wednesday to hear arguments on whether Trump exceeded his authority to enact sweeping duties on U.S. trading partners.
